item.title: Bell-Jar
item.description: #deep “I saw my life branching out before me like the green fig tree in the story. From the tip of every branch, like a fat

item.title: Born in Stars We Live on Earth as Poets

item.title: cinematic film ideas
item.description: college coming - of - age how we brine in our own ego, we saw god in the rear mirror and laughed image of us in ith copenhagen paris

item.title: i hate the sound of my own voice.
item.description: the way it comes back from the recording, distorted, high pitched. the way it cracks and splinters in the face of conflict and emotion.

item.title: realizations
item.description: i gravitate towards older chinese girl who serve as the sister who was never rlly there for me being with the other person can be hard, but finding love for the other should be easy i tend to string along people as “just in case” someone who i actually want doesnt want me back e.

item.title: tokens of happiness
item.description: started 10/17/23 painting pumpkins with other students calling katherine & seeing her face & her saying she loved my voice going to the black diamond & seeing the light fill the space reminds me of that quote from a little life on how the light on a subway is restorative when my graphic design teacher commented im good at seeing connections the shadows of leaves on european facades talking w stepho and texting her throughout the day putting on a sweater BEST pizza ever at baest rooming w michelle: dont have to worry about being lonely 10/31/23
